mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry ( category, title, content, member_id, regdate, status ) VALUES ( #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{memberId}, SYSDATE, '처리 중' )
mapper.select: SELECT i.inquiry_id AS inquiryId, i.member_id AS memberId, i.category, i.title, i.content, i.answer, i.status, i.regdate AS regDate, i.ansdate AS ansDate, m.nickname AS memberName, a.nickname AS adminName FROM inquiry i LEFT JOIN member m ON i.member_id = m.member_id LEFT JOIN member a ON i.admin_id = a.member_id WHERE i.member_id = #{memberId}
